Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an extraordinary price of $9,500. This offer is not only a reflection of my confidence in the product's worth but also an attempt to make it more accessible to you. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this special offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
